src:
Stouk propao kao žeton, treća liga je sve bliže
Vest Bromvič rutinski rešio gostovanje na kojem su nekad često padali premijerligaši

04 Nov 2019

Nekada strah i trepet u Premijer ligi i tim koji je bilo gotovo nemoguće dobiti u gostima, pogotovo u kišnoj noći, a sada izvesni putnik u treću ligu. Nastavlja se lagano propadanje i odumiranje nekad simpatičnog Stouka sa sve "velškim Ćavijem" Džo Alenom koji je večeras samo posmatrao kako novi lider Čempionšipa Vest Bromvič Albion odnosi bodove na Hautorns.
Rutinskih 2:0 za šampionsku ekipu Slavena Bilića koja se nije ni umarala ni iživljavala već je sa po jednim golom u svakom od poluvremena počastila Grnčare na zatvaranju 15. kola. Ništa nije više u gradu na Trentu u duhu fudbala, poluprazne tribine dovoljno svedoče, a nasatavak propadanja ekipe koju je večeras (privremeno) vodio Rori Delap, posle odlaska Velšanina Nejtana Džonsa, nagovestio je Met Filips već posle osam minuta igre i lepe akcije Vrećica.
Dominirao je VBA tokom čitavog meča, Stouk tek poneki put zapretio, a meč je definitivno odlučen u 69. minutu kada je posle ispravno dosuđenog jedanaesterca iskusni Velšanin Hal Robson Kanu postavio konačnih 2:0. Ovim trijumfom VBA se vratio na čelo Čempionšipa sa dobrim izgledima da se kao jedna od dve najbolje ekipe lako dočepa Premijer lige na kraju sezone.
Stouk za koji su od velikih imena ostali samo golman i to nekadašnji reprezentativac Džek Batland i Džo Alen biće ovo duga i mučna sezona pošto ništa ne ukazuje na poboljšanje nakon 15 odigranih kola u kojima su zabeležili čak 11 poraza. Daleko su Grnčari od onog vragolastog Stouka sa "kostolomcem" Šoukrosom, vrsnim taktičarem Tonijem Pjulisom i sjajnim Delapom koji je izvodio aut kao korner. Tuga...

text:
Stoke failed as a token, the third league getting closer
West Bromwich routinely tackles a guest spot where Premier League players have often fallen

04 Nov 2019

Formerly fear and trembling in the Premier League and a team that was almost impossible to get away, especially on a rainy night, and now a certain traveler to the third league. The still-decaying and waning of the once sympathetic Stoke continues with the increasingly "Welsh Cavie" Joe Allen watching tonight as the new West Bromwich Albion Leader Albion points the points at the Hautorns.
Rutinski 2: 0 for the championship team of Slavic Bilic, who did not get tired or alive, but with one goal in each half honored the potters at the closing of the 15th round. There is nothing more in the city of Trent in the spirit of football, the half empty stands testify enough, and the continuing demise of the team led tonight (temporarily) by Rory Delap, after the departure of Welshman Nathan Jones, has been hinted at by Matt Phillips after eight minutes of play and a nice sack action.
He dominated the WBA throughout the match, Stoke threatened only a few times, and the match was definitely decided in the 69th minute when, after a properly awarded penalty, experienced Welshman Hal Robson Kanu made it 2-0. With this triumph, the WBA returned to the forefront of the Championship with the good prospect of being easily one of the two best teams to reach the Premier League at the end of the season.
The Stoke for which the big names remain only the goalkeeper, former teammate Jack Batland and Joe Allen, will be a long and painful season as nothing indicates improvement after 15 rounds in which they recorded as many as 11 defeats. The Potters are far from the devilish Stoke with the "costumed" Shawkros, the excellent tactician Toni Pjulis and the brilliant Delap who made the car as a corner. Sadness ...
